version_description:
Service Highlights:

- Barcode Scanner

- Payment Slip Generator

- Bill Payment for 6 Major Telecomm and Utility Companies

- Installment Payment Set-Up (Retail to EPP)

- EPP Participating Merchants Directory

- Insurance Inquiries

- Click to Call (Customer Service Hotline)

Service Highlights:

- Barcode Scanner

- Payment Slip Generator

- Bill Payment for 6 Major Telecomm and Utility Companies

- Installment Payment Set-Up (Retail to EPP)

- EPP Participating Merchants Directory

- Insurance Inquiries

- Click to Call (Customer Service Hotline)

1. Citi Mobile® Application now supports iOS 9.2
2. Service Highlights:
- Registration
- Account Snapshot
- Mobile OTP
- Touch ID Sensor
- Barcode Scanner for Credit Card and Loan Statement
- Payment Slip Generator
- Bill Payment for 6 Major Telecomm and Utility Companies
- Easy Payment Plan Set-Up (Retail to Easy Payment Plan)
- Easy Payment Plan Merchants
- Insurance Inquiries
- Click to Call (Customer Service Hotline)

1. Citi Mobile® Application now supports iOS 9.2
2. Service Highlights:
- Registration
- Account Snapshot
- Mobile OTP
- Touch ID Sensor
- Barcode Scanner for Credit Card and Loan Statement
- Payment Slip Generator
- Bill Payment for 6 Major Telecomm and Utility Companies
- Easy Payment Plan Set-Up (Retail to Easy Payment Plan)
- Easy Payment Plan Merchants
- Insurance Inquiries
- Click to Call (Customer Service Hotline)

1. Citi Mobile® Application now supports iOS 9.3
2. Service Highlights:
- Registration
- Account Snapshot
- Mobile OTP
- Touch ID™
- Barcode Scanner for Credit Card and Loan Statement
- Payment Slip Generator
- Bill Payment for 6 Major Telecomm and Utility Companies
- Easy Payment Plan Set-Up (Retail to Easy Payment Plan)
- Easy Payment Plan Merchants
- Insurance Inquiries
- Click to Call (Customer Service Hotline)

1. Citi Mobile® Application now supports iOS 9.3

1. Citi Mobile® Application now supports iOS 10.0
2. Service Highlights:
- Registration
- Account Snapshot
- Mobile OTP
- Touch ID Sensor
- Non-predesignated account fund transfer
- Foreign Securities/ ETF
- Barcode Scanner for Credit Card and Loan Statement
- Payment Slip Generator
- Bill Payment for 6 Major Telecomm and Utility Companies
- Easy Payment Plan Set-Up (Includes: Retail to Easy Payment Plan and Installment cash advance service)

優化使用者介面，包含:
-信用卡開卡功能
-設定預借現金密碼功能
-帳單餘額查詢
-下載信用卡帳單PDF功能
-帳單分期功能
-消費分期
-分期預借現金
-註冊網路銀行
-忘記使用者代號/密碼
-切換使用者代號
-行動密碼
-指紋/臉部辨識登入
-推播通知
-使用情況回報
-客戶服務
